definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: tread, thresh (Ar. da0sa, As. dâšu, Impf. 1 S. adîš Dl:Pr 191 COT:Gloss Hom:NS 391; cf. NH [[דּוּשׁ]], Aram. id., do4; v. further Nö:ZMG 1883, 538)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. [[דָּשׁ]] 1Ch 21:20, [[וְדַשְׁתִּ֫י]] Ju Jdg 8:7; Impf. [[וַיׇּדָשׁ]] so rd. for [[וַיּׁדַע]] Ju Jdg 8:16 cf. Be Door Bu Vrss; 2 ms. [[תָּדוּשׁ]] Is 41:15, Hb Hab 3:12; 3 ms. sf. [[יְדוּשֶָׁנּוּ]] Is 28:28; 3 fs. sf. [[תְּדוּשֶָׁהָ]] Job 39:15; Imv. fs. [[דּוֹשִׁי]] Mic 4:13; Inf. cstr. [[לָדֻשׁ]] 2Ki 13:7, [[לָדוּשׁ]] Ho 10:11, sf. [[דּוּשָׁם]] Am 1:13; [[דִּישׁוֹ]] De 25:4; abs. [[אָדוֹשׁ]] Is 28:28 as if fr. [[אדשׁ]] cf. Kö:i. 444; yet [[ארשׁ]] nowhere else & form very possibly textual error, cf. Ol:§ 245 k; Pt. f. [[דָּשָׁא]] Je 50:11; —tread on, trample on, c. acc. Job 39:15 (beast on eggs, ‖[[זוּר]]); thresh, lit. c. acc. [[חִטִּים]] 1Ch 21:20, Je 50:11, [[לֶחֶם]] (i.e. its material) Is 28:28 (in sim.); abs. 2Ki 13:7 (in sim.); Ho 10:11 (metaph. of Ephraim as heifer); tread or thresh Ju Jdg 8:7 with ([[אֶת]] = together with, cf. Stu; Ew:§ 234 e takes as acc., & vb. as abbrev Hiph.) thorns, [[קוֹחִים]] and [[בַּרְקָנִים]] q.v.; and also in Ju Jdg 8:16 (rd. [[וידשׁ]] cf. supr.) sq. [[בָּהֶם]], with them, ref. to [[קוחים]] and [[ברקנים]]; fig. devastation of land Am 1:3 (Gilead), destruction of peoples Hb Hab 3:12 ([[גוים]]); espec. Mic 4:13 (abs.), where full metaph.; hyperbol. of Israel Is 41:15 c. acc. [[הרים]].—

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: be trampled down, Pf. [[וְנׇדוֹשׁ]] consec. Is 25:10 fig., subj. Moab; Inf. [[הִדּוּשׁ]] ib. (simile, subj. [[מתבן]] straw-heap; on form cf. Ol:§ 193 a Ba:NB 156)—
